column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I appreciate your kind words
column2: but please know if you ever receive a seasoned egg that doesn't meet your personal standards
column3: let your server know and he or she will offer you another. We serve upwards of 1
column5: so by the sheer laws of probability
column6: there are going to be eggs that don't have the custard yolk that we aim for. Moreover
column7: our poke bowls are prepared with fresh ingredients daily.
